summarizes the comparison between classification of economic activities (ISIC Rev. 3.1, 
NACE Rev. 1.1 and NAICS) and, finally, Table 4-5 summarizes the comparison between 
apprenticeship classifications (ISCED 97 and Classification of Fields of Education and 
Training (FOET)).
